com.android.server.wifi

Class WifiService

  • java.lang.Object
    • IWifiManager.Stub
      • com.android.server.wifi.WifiService

  • public final class WifiService
extends IWifiManager.Stub
    WifiService handles remote WiFi operation requests by implementing the IWifiManager interface.

      • checkAndStartWifi

        public void checkAndStartWifi()
        Check if Wi-Fi needs to be enabled and start if needed This function is used only at boot time

      • pingSupplicant

        public boolean pingSupplicant()
        see WifiManager.pingSupplicant()
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeds, false otherwise

      • startScan

        public void startScan()
        see WifiManager.startScan()

      • setWifiEnabled

        public boolean setWifiEnabled(boolean enable)
        see WifiManager.setWifiEnabled(boolean)
        Parameters:
        enable - true to enable, false to disable.
        Returns:
        true if the enable/disable operation was started or is already in the queue.

      • getWifiEnabledState

        public int getWifiEnabledState()
        see WifiManager.getWifiState()
        Returns:
        One of WifiManager.WIFI_STATE_DISABLED, WifiManager.WIFI_STATE_DISABLING, WifiManager.WIFI_STATE_ENABLED, WifiManager.WIFI_STATE_ENABLING, WifiManager.WIFI_STATE_UNKNOWN

      • setWifiApEnabled

        public void setWifiApEnabled(android.net.wifi.WifiConfiguration wifiConfig,
                             boolean enabled)
        see WifiManager.setWifiApEnabled(WifiConfiguration, boolean)
        Parameters:
        wifiConfig - SSID, security and channel details as part of WifiConfiguration
        enabled - true to enable and false to disable

      • getWifiApEnabledState

        public int getWifiApEnabledState()
        see WifiManager.getWifiApState()
        Returns:
        One of WifiManager.WIFI_AP_STATE_DISABLED, WifiManager.WIFI_AP_STATE_DISABLING, WifiManager.WIFI_AP_STATE_ENABLED, WifiManager.WIFI_AP_STATE_ENABLING, WifiManager.WIFI_AP_STATE_FAILED

      • getWifiApConfiguration

        Returns:

        see WifiManager.setWifiApConfiguration(WifiConfiguration)
        Parameters:
        wifiConfig - WifiConfiguration details for soft access point

      • removeNetwork

        See WifiManager.removeNetwork(int)
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • enableNetwork

        public boolean enableNetwork(int netId,
                             boolean disableOthers)
        See WifiManager.enableNetwork(int, boolean)
        Parameters:
        netId - the integer that identifies the network configuration to the supplicant
        disableOthers - if true, disable all other networks.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded

        Parameters:

      • getScanResults

        public java.util.List<android.net.wifi.ScanResult> getScanResults(java.lang.String callingPackage)

        Returns:
        the list of results

      • saveConfiguration

        public boolean saveConfiguration()
        Tell the supplicant to persist the current list of configured networks.
        Returns:
        true if the operation succeeded TODO: deprecate this

      • setCountryCode

        public void setCountryCode(java.lang.String countryCode,
                           boolean persist)
        Set the country code
        Parameters:
        countryCode - ISO 3166 country code.
        persist - true if the setting should be remembered. The persist behavior exists so that wifi can fall back to the last persisted country code on a restart, when the locale information is not available from telephony.

      • setFrequencyBand

        public void setFrequencyBand(int band,
                             boolean persist)
        Set the operational frequency band
        Parameters:
        band - One of WifiManager.WIFI_FREQUENCY_BAND_AUTO, WifiManager.WIFI_FREQUENCY_BAND_5GHZ, WifiManager.WIFI_FREQUENCY_BAND_2GHZ,
        persist - true if the setting should be remembered.

      • getFrequencyBand

        public int getFrequencyBand()
        Get the operational frequency band
